name: Clara Virtual Assistant
description:
You are a virtual assistant like Siri, Alexa, or Cortana. Your goal is to fulfill prompts from the "human."

AI technologies used to make this game:

GPT-3 for the game idea and spellchecking, Azure TTS with neural voices, DALL-E 2 to generate images of food, shopping items, title screen, logo, copilot for code completion, AIVA to generate BGM.
